DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to determine what precolonoscopic measures can be correlated to pain during colonoscopy
DOC.brief_title: Open Prospective Study for Determination of Predictive Measures for Pain During Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the work is to determine prdictive pre-endoscopic factors for pain during colonoscpy. These factors may be demographic, antrophometric, socio-ecomomic, related to previous medical staus or to anxiety levels. We will try to find an objective parameter for prdiction of pain during colonoscopy, so pre-procedural intervantion will be applied in order to reduce the pain.
DOC.criteria: age 1870 screening colonoscopy Failed prior colonoscopy pain as a main referral indication complications during previous exam Inpatients Excision of more than 3 polyps Diagnosis ofCancer, IBD Incomplete exam
